[/split_line_heading][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]The Path of Exploration offers a significant advantage: temporary immunity to attacks while exploring the Kingdom lands.

You have the flexibility to activate Neutrality, exclusively available while on the Path of Exploration, at various levels throughout the game, starting with your personal account. If you’re a Chieftain, you can also apply this setting to your Encampment, Village, City, or Kingdom. Similarly, if you hold one of the 18 Regional Seats of Power, you can extend this protection to your entire region.

It’s important to note that enabling neutrality to protect your land from invasion does not override the Path or setting choices made by individual players on your land in their quests. Additionally, if you hold a regional throne, enabling neutrality to prevent regional invasion does not impact the choices made by tribes, villages, cities, or kingdoms within your region; they may
